TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCachePolicy extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含可用于设置特定于缓存的 HTTP 标头以及用于控制 ASP.NET 页输出缓存的方法。

span.span: Contains methods for setting cache-specific HTTP headers and for controlling the ASP.NET page output cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 HTTP 标头和控制缓存的背景信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For background information about HTTP headers and controlling caching, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddValidationCallback (System.Web.HttpCacheValidateHandler handler, object data);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddValidationCallback(class System.Web.HttpCacheValidateHandler handler, object data) cil managed
Public Sub AddValidationCallback (handler As HttpCacheValidateHandler, data As Object)

span.span: The value.

param.name: data
param.span: 传递回 委托的用户提供的任意数据。

span.span: The arbitrary user-supplied data that is passed back to the delegate.

summary.span: 注册当前响应的验证回调。

span.span: Registers a validation callback for the current response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种机制来检查缓存中以编程方式响应之前由输出缓存到客户端返回的响应。The method provides a mechanism to check the response programmatically in the cache before the response is returned to the client by the output cache. 从 Web 服务器缓存中提供响应之前，所有已注册处理程序进行查询，以确保资源的有效性。Before the response is served from the Web server cache, all registered handlers are queried to ensure resource validity. 如果任何处理程序设置指示缓存的响应不有效的标志，该项目为无效，排除标记从缓存中。If any handler sets a flag indicating that the cached response is not valid, the entry is marked as not valid and expelled from the cache. 在这种情况下，作为以及任何处理程序指示此请求时应忽略缓存的响应，该请求，然后处理，就好像缓存未命中。In this case, as well as when any handler indicates that the cached response should be ignored for this request, the request is then handled as if it were a cache miss. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加委托，以验证查询字符串值所基于的申请。The following code example demonstrates how to add a delegate to validate a request based on query string values. [!code-aspx-csharp[Cache Validation Callback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache validation callback/CS/ValidationCallbackcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Cache Validation Callback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache validation callback/VB/ValidationCallbackvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The specified is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AppendCacheExtension(string extension) cil managed

param.name: extension
param.span: 要追加到 标头的文本。

span.span: The text to append to the header.

summary.span: 指定将文本追加到 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Appends the specified text to the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果浏览器无法识别缓存控制指令或扩展，在浏览器必须忽略无法识别的术语。If the browser does not recognize cache control directives or extensions, the browser must ignore the unrecognized terms. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将支持的 Internet 资源管理器的缓存控制扩展。The following code example demonstrates the use of a cache-control extension supported by Internet Explorer. 服务器指示浏览器到一小时内不会更改内容 (`pre-check=3600`) 并指示它直接从本地缓存中检索内容。The server is indicating to the browser that the content will not change for one hour (`pre-check=3600`) and instructs it to retrieve the content directly from the local cache. 但是，如果修改了内容，通过在服务器和页面请求的用户在 15 分钟 (`post-check= 900`) 到 1 小时内，在浏览器将显示在本地缓存中找到的信息，但还要执行背景检查和可选的提取在服务器上的新内容。However, if the content is modified by the server and the page is requested by the user within a fifteen-minute (`post-check= 900`) to one-hour period, the browser displays the information found in the local cache but also performs a background check and optional fetch of the new content on the server. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory(bool allow) cil managed

param.name: allow
param.span: 指示客户端浏览器将响应存储在“历史记录”文件夹中，否则为 。

span.span: to direct the client browser to store responses in the History folder; otherwise .
The default is .

summary.span: 当 参数为 时，将使响应在客户端浏览器“历史记录”缓存中可用，而不论服务器上所做的 设置是什么。

span.span: Makes the response is available in the client browser History cache, regardless of the setting made on the server, when the parameter is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为或 `Expires` HTTP 标头是默认情况下设置为-1; 这将告知客户端不向缓存响应中的历史记录文件夹中，以便使用后退/前进按钮时客户端请求的新版本响应每次。When is set to or the `Expires` HTTP header is by default set to -1; this tells the client not to cache responses in the History folder, so that when you use the back/forward buttons the client requests a new version of the response each time. 可以通过调用重写此行为方法替换`allow`参数设置为`true`。You can override this behavior by calling the method with the `allow` parameter set to `true`. 如果设置为值而不或，则调用方法替换为上述任意值`allow`不起作用。If is set to values other than or , calling the method with either value for `allow` has no effect. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以将响应存储在自定义其历史记录中将客户端定向。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to direct the client to store the responses in its history in a custom . [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory/CS/httpcachepolicy_setallowresponseinbrowserhistorycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory/VB/httpcachepolicy_setallowresponseinbrowserhistoryvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 设置 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header.

summary.span: HTTP 标头控制在网络上缓存文档的方式。

span.span: The HTTP header controls how documents are to be cached on the network.

span.span: An enumeration value.

summary.span: 将 标头设置为 值之一。

span.span: Sets the header to one of the values of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置`Cache-Control`标头的枚举值与`no-cache`。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Cache-Control` header to the enumerated value for `no-cache`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCacheability (System.Web.HttpCacheability cacheability, string field);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetCacheability(valuetype System.Web.HttpCacheability cacheability, string field) cil managed
Public Sub SetCacheability (cacheability As HttpCacheability, field As String)

param.name: cacheability
param.span: 要将标头设置为的 枚举。

span.span: The enumeration value to set the header to.

param.name: field
param.span: 添加到标头的缓存控制扩展。

span.span: The cache control extension to add to the header.

summary.span: 将 标头设置为 值之一，并将扩展追加到指令。

span.span: Sets the header to one of the values of and appends an extension to the directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段名称扩展是仅当与一起使用时才有效`private`或`no-cache`指令。The field name extension is valid only when used with the `private` or `no-cache` directives. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 如果不兼容的指令和扩展组合在一起，此方法将引发无效参数异常。This method will throw an invalid argument exception if incompatible directives and extensions are combined. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何`Cache-Control`标头设置为枚举值`private`，并将添加的缓存控制扩展。The following code example demonstrates how the `Cache-Control` header is set to the enumeration value `private` and adds a cache-control extension. 已修改的指令意味着，除了任何非共享缓存，仅由名为"DEV"社区的成员共享的任何缓存可能会缓存响应。The modified directive means that in addition to any non-shared cache, any cache shared only by members of the community named "DEV" may cache the response. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

is not or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetETag(string etag) cil managed

param.name: etag
param.span: 要用于 标头的文本。

span.span: The text to use for the header.

summary.span: 将 HTTP 标头设置为指定的字符串。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header to the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ETag`标头是特定版本的文档的唯一标识符。The `ETag` header is a unique identifier for a specific version of a document. 客户端使用它来验证客户端缓存内容，以避免再次请求。It is used by clients to validate client-cached content to avoid requesting it again. 一次`ETag`标头是设置此选项，后续尝试将其设置失败并且引发异常。Once an `ETag` header is set, subsequent attempts to set it fail and an exception is thrown. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置`ETag`为自定义值的标头。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `ETag` header to a custom value. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
The header has already been set.
\- or -
The has already been called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetETagFromFileDependencies() cil managed

summary.span: 基于处理程序的文件依赖项的时间戳设置 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header based on the time stamps of the handler's file dependencies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置`ETag`方法检索该处理程序依赖于其上的所有文件的上次修改的时间戳，将所有文件的名称和时间戳都组合成单个字符串，然后到单个摘要的哈希该字符串的标头用作`ETag`。The method sets the `ETag` header by retrieving the last modified time stamps of all files on which the handler is dependent, combining all file names and time stamps into a single string, then hashing that string into a single digest that is used as the `ETag`. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置`ETag`标头。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `ETag` header. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The header has already been set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetExpires(valuetype System.DateTime date) cil managed

param.name: date
param.span: 将 标头设置为的绝对 值。

span.span: The absolute value to set the header to.

summary.span: 将 HTTP 标头设置为绝对日期和时间。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header to an absolute date and time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果过期日期违反限制原则，此方法将失败。This method will fail if the expiration date violates the principle of restrictiveness. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置过期时间为下午 6:00The following code example demonstrates how to set the expiration time to 6:00 P.M. 当前的到期日期上的本地时间。local time on the current expiration day. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetLastModified(valuetype System.DateTime date) cil managed

span.span: The new value for the header.

summary.span: 将 HTTP 标头设置为提供的 值。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header to the value supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Last-Modified` HTTP 标头的时间戳与文档`DateTime`值，该值指示上次修改该文档。The `Last-Modified` HTTP header time stamps the document with the `DateTime` value indicating when the document was last modified. 如果违反了缓存限制层次结构，此方法将失败。This method will fail if the caching restrictiveness hierarchy is violated. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置`Last-Modified`的新日期的标头。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Last-Modified` header to a new date. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is later than the current .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetMaxAge(valuetype System.TimeSpan delta) cil managed

param.name: delta
param.span: 用于设置 - 标头的时间跨度。

span.span: The time span used to set the - header.

summary.span: 基于指定的时间跨度设置 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header based on the specified time span.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Max-age` 是一个文档允许在被视为陈旧之前存在的最大绝对时间。`Max-age` is the maximum absolute time a document is allowed to exist before being considered stale. 方法不使用可调到期，并且如果到期日期违反了限制原则将失败。The method does not use sliding expiration and will fail if the expiration date violates the principle of restrictiveness. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果方法上的第二个和后续调用重复调用，只能减少最长使用时间值。If the method is called repeatedly, on the second and subsequent calls, the value of the maximum age can only be decreased. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置`Cache-Control: max-age`为 0 小时，30 分钟和 0 秒的标头。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Cache-Control: max-age` header to 0 hours, 30 minutes, and 0 seconds. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than one year.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetNoServerCaching() cil managed

summary.span: 停止针对当前响应的所有源服务器缓存。

span.span: Stops all origin-server caching for the current response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 明确拒绝缓存的源服务器上的文档。Explicitly denies caching of the document on the origin-server. 完成设置后，完全处理的文档的所有请求。Once set, all requests for the document are fully processed. 调用此方法时，不能为当前响应重新启用缓存。When this method is invoked, caching cannot be re-enabled for the current response. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何禁用输出缓存响应的其余部分。The following code example demonstrates how to disable output caching for the remainder of the response. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetNoStore() cil managed

summary.span: 设置 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法的类，以指示客户端不在其历史记录中存储的响应。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method of the class to direct the client not to store the responses in its history. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpCachePolicySetNoStore#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetNoStore/CS/httpcachepolicy_setnostorecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpCachePolicySetNoStore#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetNoStore/VB/httpcachepolicy_setnostorevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetNoTransforms() cil managed

summary.span: 设置 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP 标头会指示网络缓存应用程序不能修改文档。The `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP header instructs network caching applications not to modify the document. `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP 标头可以防止下游代理服务器更改指定的任何标头值`Content-Encoding`， `Content-Range`，或`Content-Type`标头 （这包括实体正文）。The `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP header prevents downstream proxy servers from changing any header values specified by the `Content-Encoding`, `Content-Range`, or `Content-Type` headers (this includes the entity body). 例如，它会阻止代理将 GIF 图像转换为 PNG。For example, it prevents proxies from converting GIF images to PNG. 与上一次缓存的其他限制一样调用时， `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP 标头不能通过禁用接口。As with other restrictions on caching, once is called, the `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP header cannot be disabled through the interface. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何发送`Cache-Control: no-transform`指令与当前响应。The following code example demonstrates how to send the `Cache-Control: no-transform` directive with the current response. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetOmitVaryStar(bool omit) cil managed

param.name: omit
param.span: 若要指示 不对其 属性使用 \* 值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to direct the to not use the \* value for its property; otherwise, .

summary.span: 指定在按参数进行区分时，响应是否应该包含 标头。

span.span: Specifies whether the response should contain the header when varying by parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以防止输出响应添加`vary:*`到传出响应时因参数而异的缓存的响应标头。This method allows you to prevent the output ached from adding a `vary:*` header to the outgoing response when the cached response varies by parameter. 这可用于改变缓存的查询字符串，因为大多数客户端会自动因查询字符串而不需要的客户端`vary:*`标头。This is useful for clients varying caching by query string because most clients will automatically vary by query string without requiring the `vary:*` header. > [!NOTE] > 使用`vary:*`标头可以禁用所有客户端缓存。The use of the `vary:*` header can disable all client caching. 这是一种简便方法来影响属性。This is a convenience method to affect the property. 传递`true`将定向到该方法忽略 \* 值属性。Passing `true` to the method directs the to ignore the \* value for the property. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

[!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，等效于，是将这两个指令发送的标头中，除非显式指定此方法。The default, which is equivalent to , is to send neither directive in a header unless explicitly specified by this method. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将缓存重新验证时设置为。The following code example demonstrates how to set cache revalidation to . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetSlidingExpiration(bool slide) cil managed

span.span: or .

summary.span: 将缓存过期从绝对时间设置为可调时间。

span.span: Sets cache expiration to from absolute to sliding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将缓存过期时间设置为滑动，`Cache-Control`将每个响应续订 HTTP 标头。When cache expiration is set to sliding, the `Cache-Control` HTTP header will be renewed with each response. 此过期模式等同于 IIS 配置选项以将过期标头添加到相对于当前时间设置的所有输出。This expiration mode is identical to the IIS configuration option to add an expiration header to all output set relative to the current time. 如果您显式将可调过期设置为 off (`false`)，将保留该设置，启用可调过期的任何尝试将以静默方式失败。If you explicitly set sliding expiration to off (`false`), that setting will be preserved and any attempts to enable sliding expiration will silently fail. 此方法不直接映射到 HTTP 标头。This method does not directly map to an HTTP header. 由后续模块或辅助角色设置源服务器的请求缓存策略。It is used by subsequent modules or worker requests to set origin-server cache policy. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置可调过期到`true`。The following code example demonstrates how to set sliding expiration to `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetValidUntilExpires(bool validUntilExpires) cil managed

param.name: validUntilExpires
param.span: 如果缓存忽略 无效标头，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cache ignores invalidation headers; otherwise, .

summary.span: 指定 ASP.NET 缓存是否应忽略客户端发送的使缓存失效的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Specifies whether the ASP.NET cache should ignore HTTP headers sent by the client that invalidate the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置为`true`时自动启动的高层次`<%@ OutputCache … %>`使用页指令。The method is set to `true` automatically when the high-level `<%@ OutputCache … %>` page directive is used. 提供此方法，因为刷新页面视图时，某些浏览器到 Web 服务器发送 HTTP 缓存失效标头和逐出缓存中的页。This method is provided because some browsers, when refreshing a page view, send HTTP cache invalidation headers to the Web server and evict the page from the cache. 当`validUntilExpires`参数是`true`，ASP.NET 将忽略缓存失效标头和页面保留在缓存，直到它过期。When the `validUntilExpires` parameter is `true`, ASP.NET ignores cache invalidation headers and the page remains in the cache until it expires. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法，指示客户端发送任何缓存无效标头将被忽略。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to instruct that any cache invalidation headers sent by the client are ignored. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires/CS/httpcachepolicy_setvaliduntilexpirescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires/VB/httpcachepolicy_setvaliduntilexpiresvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetVaryByCustom(string custom) cil managed

param.name: custom
param.span: 用于改变已缓存的输出的文本字符串。

span.span: The text string to vary cached output by.

summary.span: 指定自定义文本字符串，它用于改变已缓存的输出响应。

span.span: Specifies a custom text string to vary cached output responses by.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置连接到"Accept-charset"，这会导致源服务器的缓存选择一个具体取决于浏览器的多个缓存的响应的自定义 vary 字符串`Accept-Charset`标头。The following code example demonstrates how to set the custom vary string to "Accept-Charset", which causes the origin-server's cache to choose one of several cached responses depending on the browser's `Accept-Charset` header. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

The method has already been called.

member this.UtcTimestampCreated : DateTime with get, set

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByContentEncodings As HttpCacheVaryByContentEncodings

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取用于区分输出缓存的 标头列表。

span.span: Gets the list of headers that will be used to vary the output cache.

value.span: 指定将用于选择缓存的响应的 标头对象。

span.span: An object that specifies which headers are used to select the cached response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的 Content-encoding 标头，表示要由输出缓存发生变化的压缩方案的列表。The property returns a list of Content-Encoding headers that represent compression schemes to vary the output cache by. 缓存动态压缩的响应意味着压缩成本就会开始计费仅一次，第一个请求的资源。Caching dynamically compressed responses means that the cost of compression is incurred only one time, during the first request for the resource. 属性用于`Accept-Encoding`请求以确定如何处理不同的内容编码动态压缩的缓存的响应标头。The property is used with the `Accept-Encoding` header of a request to determine how to serve cached responses for different content encodings that are dynamically compressed. Accept-encoding 标头列出了客户端可以解压缩的编码。The Accept-Encoding header lists the encodings that the client can decompress. 当你设置缓存进行不同的内容编码时，它允许间接因中的值在响应`Accept-Encoding`标头。When you set the cache to vary by content encoding, it lets the response vary indirectly by the value in the `Accept-Encoding` header. 处理请求时，`Accept-Encoding`检查标头和第一个可接受编码是标识，用来执行以下操作之一：When a request is processed, the `Accept-Encoding` header is checked and the first acceptable encoding is identified and used to take one of the following actions: - 如果在找到相匹配的编码列表和缓存的响应存在时，发送缓存的响应。If a matching encoding is found in the list and a cached response exists, the cached response is sent. - 如果在找到相匹配的编码列表，但缓存的响应不存在，生成响应并将其插入到缓存。If a matching encoding is found in the list but a cached response does not exist, a response is generated and inserted into the cache. - 如果在找不到相匹配的编码对于非编码的响应，也称为标识响应搜索列表中，缓存。If a matching encoding is not found in the list, the cache is searched for a non-encoded response, also referred to as the identity response. 如果找到未经过编码的响应，则将它发送。If the non-encoded response is found, it is sent. 否则为新的非编码响应是生成，发送并存储在缓存中。Otherwise, a new non-encoded response is generated, sent, and stored in the cache. 有关详细信息属性，请参阅"RFC 2616:: 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，"上提供[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about the property, see "RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1," which is available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 有关内容编码的信息位于第 14 节"标头字段定义。"Information about content encodings is in section 14, "Header Field Definitions." 可以设置属性使用`VaryByContentEncodings`指令的特性。You can set the property by using the `VaryByContentEncodings` attribute of the directive. 此外可以将缓存配置文件添加到 Web.config 文件中的元素。You can also add a cache profile to the element in the Web.config file. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何启用针对页后，可以从输出缓存提供的动态压缩的响应。The following example shows how to enable a dynamically compressed response for a page to be served from the output cache. 可接受的编码为"gzip"，并通过使用设置`VaryByContentEncodings`指令的特性。The encoding that is acceptable is "gzip" and is set by using the `VaryByContentEncodings` attribute of the directive. 如果承载该页面的 Web 服务器没有启用动态压缩，输出缓存不会缓存的响应，根据指定的内容编码。If the Web server that is hosting the page does not have dynamic compression enabled, the output cache will not have a cached response that is based on the specified content encoding. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/VB/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByHeaders As HttpCacheVaryByHeaders
public: property System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByHeaders ^ VaryByHeaders { System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByHeaders ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取将用于改变缓存输出的所有 HTTP 标头的列表。

span.span: Gets the list of all HTTP headers that will be used to vary cache output.

value.span: 一个 ，它指定用于选择缓存响应的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: An that specifies which HTTP headers are used to select the cached response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当缓存的项具有多个不同的标头时，请求的单独版本是文档的从为每个 HTTP 标头类型缓存中。When a cached item has several vary headers, a separate version of the requested document is available from the cache for each HTTP header type. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByParams As HttpCacheVaryByParams
public: property System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByParams ^ VaryByParams { System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByParams ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取由影响缓存的 HTTP 或 HTTP 接收的参数列表。

span.span: Gets the list of parameters received by an HTTP or HTTP that affect caching.

value.span: 一个 ，它指定用于选择缓存响应的缓存控制标头。

span.span: An that specifies which cache-control headers are used to select the cached response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从缓存中每个命名参数提供了请求的文档的单独版本集合。A separate version of the requested document is available from the cache for each named parameter in the collection. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
